intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Lightsler AI Translation is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

types.title: Types of Information
items: Store Information: Store name, URL, owner email
Translation Content: Product, collection, theme and other resource data
Usage Data: Translation request logs, API call records
Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information

method.title: Collection Methods
items: Automatically obtained through Shopify API
Your actions and settings in the app
Third-party services (such as translation API providers)

usage.title: How We Use Information
items: Provide translation services
Improve service quality and user experience
Technical support and troubleshooting
Send service-related notifications
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share in the following situations:
scenarios: Translation Service: Share content to be translated with translation API provider (currently using {{gptApiHost}})
Legal Requirements: As required by law, regulation, or government
Business Transfer: During mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales
Your Consent: Other situations with your explicit authorization

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services We Use
items: Crisp Chat (crisp.chat): Used for in-app customer support. When chat is enabled we may share your shop domain and contact email with Crisp. Privacy: https://crisp.chat/en/privacy/
OpenAI API: Used to process translation content you submit. Content is sent to the translation API for processing. Privacy: https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy

security.title: Data Security
items: Use industry-standard encryption technology
Regular security audits and vulnerability scanning
Restrict employee access permissions
Secure data storage and transmission

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Active shops: retained while the app is installed. Uninstalled shops: data is soft-deleted immediately and permanently purged within 48 hours. GDPR deletion requests: processed and purged within 48 hours. System logs/metrics are trimmed within 30 days unless required sooner.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access: View the information we hold about you
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate information
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
Restriction: Restrict how we process your information
Objection: Object to our processing of your information
Portability: Obtain your data in a structured format
rights.exercise: To exercise these rights, please contact: {{supportEmail}}

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy. Significant changes will be communicated via email or in-app notification.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns, please contact:

disclaimer: Disclaimer: This privacy policy is the initial version and will be continuously improved to meet the latest legal requirements.
